channel.title: CVE Feed for daggerhart -- OpenID Connect Generic Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for daggerhart -- OpenID Connect Generic Client

item.title: CVE-2021-24214|2024-08-03T19:21:18.670Z -- daggerhart -- openid%20connect%20generic%20client
item.description: The OpenID Connect Generic Client WordPress plugin 3.8.0 and 3.8.1 did not sanitise the login error when output back in the login form, leading to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue. This issue does not require authentication and can be exploited with the default configuration.
